column2: "Woohoo, thanks! I see, I see. So this is the Mech-like hostile I've heard about...?"
"...This is completely different. It's neither Mech nor Darker. It's from a different world. It's really amazing!"
"First, where did this come from? Some unexplored planet? Or some other world far beyond our knowledge?"
"Hey, don't shake your head like that! I was just doing my best to bring back the festive mood!"
"This is your reward! Thanks again! Things are steadily calming down, but I just want it to just to be over already!"
